thread.title: Has Salman Khan finally lost his bachelor tag?
thread.title_full: Has Salman Khan finally lost his bachelor tag? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Has Salman Khan finally lost his bachelor tag?
text:
Strong rumours about the eternal bachelor, Salman Khan having finally lost his bachelor tag have been doing the rounds.

Salman Khan and Iulia Vantur 
I hear he has got engaged to his 'girlfriend' — Romanian TV actress-host, Iulia Vantur . The news seems to have filtered in from Iulia's hometown, Bucharest, after she was spotted with a rock on her finger.
Also read:  Did Salman meet Iulia in Romania? 
The starlet has vaguely been tweeting about "a new journey"... "La la la... such a beautiful la la... life" and "the most beautiful things we’ll find them in the heart," etc, etc. Her publicist has reportedly even confirmed that she is now engaged and will wed next year.
Also read:  Salman Khan hints at marriage to Iulia Vantur 
We know that Iulia has often been seen with Sallu at film shoots and sharing meals with his family. What does Sallu have to say about this piece of news? Knowing him, he might cackle aloud in his characteristic manner.
Also see... 
Snapped! Salman Khan shares a meal with his family and Iulia Vantur
